# clio-menu



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Javascript

```html
<clio-menu>
  <li>One</li>
  <li>Two</li>
  <li>Three</li>
</clio-menu>
```



## CSS Custom Properties

| Name               | Description                                                  |
| ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--menu-padding-y` | The menu's vertical padding. Defaults to global --spacing-s. |
